config.RenderManaBar.tooltip: Should the mana bar be rendered at all?
config.XManaBarOffset.tooltip:
Control where the mana bar is on the X axis of the screen.
Note: If Snapping is not set to -1, bar will move when the player's health shows up.
config.YManaBarOffset.tooltip:
Control where the mana bar is on the Y axis of the screen.
Not Functioning Yet
config.ManaBarGrowthLimit.tooltip: How tall can the mana bar grow?
config.ManaBarExtraSnaps.tooltip:
Automatically moves the bar over a bar's length.
So if you have a food and thirst bar, you want to set this to 2.
Set to -1 to disable snapping
